author: NASS
description:
I colorized, restored, and created sound design for this rare video of Christian Street in Jerusalem, City of Nazareth in Galilee, Holy Land 1920s. These historic cities are central to religious and cultural heritage, with Jerusalem standing as a spiritual crossroads for centuries, while Nazareth embodies the traditions and daily life of Galilee. Together, they offer a timeless glimpse into the landscapes and communities that have shaped history and faith.

00:06-06:45 Jerusalem 
06:46-08:42 Nazareth 
08:43-08:48 Solomon Sir Jones

Video Restoration Process:
✔ FPS boosted to 60 frames per second 
✔ Image resolution boosted up to HD 
✔ Improved video sharpness and brightness 
✔ Colorized only for the ambiance (not historically accurate)
✔added sound only for the ambiance
✔restoration:(stabilisation,denoise,cleand,deblur) 

Please, be aware that colorization colors are not real and fake, colorization was made only for the ambiance and do not represent real historical data.

B&W Video So
title: Rare 1920s – Jerusalem & Nazareth in Color [60fps, Remastered, w/ Sound]
